EmailTemplate.description: TIDS - VB Service Request Approval Notification
EmailTemplate.name: TIDS_VB_Service_Request_Approved_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Access to the TIDS Virtual Branch Service Granted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TIDS Virtual Branch Service Access Granted
Dear {!Contact.Name},
You now have access to the TIDS Virtual Branch Service and may apply for a Virtual Branch under your Head Office {!Account.IATACode__c}.
With a TIDS Virtual Branch, your online business activities can be identified and recognized with a distinct IATA TIDS Numeric Code.
Note that Virtual Branches should not be used to identify physical office locations. For such need, please apply for a regular Branch Office.
To initiate an application for a Virtual Branch, simply access the TIDS Service on the IATA Customer Portal and select "Add a Virtual Branch Office" from your TIDS Head Office Dashboard.
Thank you for choosing TIDS, IATA's program for standard identification of non-accredited travel sellers.
The IATA TIDS Team
You Might Also Need
IATA Travel & Tourism Training
IATA Travel Agent ID Card
IATA Timatic Solutions
This email was sent to {!Contact.Email}. Please do not reply to this email as this address is not monitored. International Air Transport Association. 800 Square Victoria, Montreal, H4Z 1M1, Canada Â© Copyright 2020. All rights reserved. https://www.iata.org
